text: I have not replaced the spaces with hyphens, that could potentially be why, It just didn't seem to filter properly but I must be missing something
For previews, live sites will be after lunch
Is there any way to get a blog posts name as just text with the blog markup? [[ content.name }} add a class and puts it inside a span. I want just the name.

I believe `{{content.title}}` will also pull back just the blog title for it. If you use `|pprint` you should be able to see a list of what you can pull back. You can also use the developer info from the sprocket menu to see values as well.
